text:
22 FEB
I Tweet (quoted⬇️)
The #DowningStreetBriefing stressed the need for "caution", after I'd been advocating this (re #CoViD19 and a new #vaccine)—using that very word—for many weeks.

23 FEB
#BorisJohnson
"... it's so important to proceed in the cautious way that ... we are." https://t.co/D78rM4vCAG https://t.co/PeLr0zHwe8
